definition: commerce/merchant/dealer/to consult/2nd note in pentatonic scale/quotient (as in 智商[zhi4 shang1], intelligence quotient)

sentences.english: In 1717 he captured a large French merchantman ship. He made this a powerful ship by putting forty guns on her and named her the "Queen Anne's Revenge".
sentences.chinese: 1717年，他捕獲了一艘大型的法蘭西商船。

sentences.english: She is like the merchant ships, bringing her food from afar.
sentences.chinese: 她好像商船從遠方運糧來。

sentences.english: Their merchant ship was reflagged last year.
sentences.chinese: 他們的商船去年改變了註冊國。

sentences.english: A Braavosi trading galley called at Pentos on her way back from the Jade Sea.
sentences.chinese: 一艘布拉佛斯商船在從翡翠海的歸途中在潘託斯休整。

sentences.english: Near the old Merchant Shipping Hall, a boy collects scraps in the rubble.
sentences.chinese: 在老商船會館附近，一個男孩正在瓦礫堆中拾荒。

sentences.english: The warships convoyed the merchant ships across the Pacific.
sentences.chinese: 戰艦護送商船穿過太平洋。

sentences.english: The shipowner has still held a merchant fleet of seven cargo-vessels.
sentences.chinese: 這個船東仍擁有一支7艘貨船的商船隊。

sentences.english: A strong side wind caused the merchant ship to lie along.
sentences.chinese: 一股強勁的側風使商船朝一邊傾斜。

sentences.english: Stray mines began to turn up off the Pacific coast, imperilling commercial shipping.
sentences.chinese: 散逸的水雷開始在太平洋海岸出現而危及商船的航行。

sentences.english: The pirates appropriated the the trading ships that sailed in their seas.
sentences.chinese: 海盜劫持了在其地盤上航行的商船。

sentences.english: Over the history of its existence the Russian merchant fleet has seen the moments of boom and decline.
sentences.chinese: 在俄羅斯的歷史上，商船隊可謂是歷盡榮辱。

sentences.english: It was a merchant ship and used for travels to Batavia.
sentences.chinese: 這是一艘商船，用於前往巴達維亞。

sentences.english: A lookout spotted what appeared to be an innocent merchant ship.
sentences.chinese: 一名瞭望哨發現一艘看似合法的商船。

sentences.english: Liang, the annual national merchant fleet arrived in Guangzhou, more than 10 groups.
sentences.chinese: 梁朝時，每年來到廣州的各國商船有10多批。

sentences.english: The ride was smooth until they got into the merchant ship's wake.
sentences.chinese: 航行一直很順利，直到他們碰上了商船的尾流。
